title: Nadiya's Everyday Baking
overview: Nadia's Everyday Baking challenges the idea that baking is time consuming or only for special occasions, with a series packed full of fun, delicious and faff-free recipes.Nadiya will show us some of her favourite dishes that let the oven take the strain any day of the week with recipes that are as aspirational as they are easy, fun and mouthwatering, with plenty of Nadiya's trademark hacks, cheats and tricks thrown in.
